comments.text:
I hit this on a private etherpad, but managed to replicate it on a public etherpad.

STR:

1) go here and create a new etherpad -- https://etherpad.mozilla.org/
2) tap so the cursor is at the bottom of the text in the main text field
3) tap and hold the delete key

Cursor starts deleting but updating the view stops after a few characters.  The delete is still going and updates once you stop holding the delete key down.
